articles.title: Zomato revises delivery partner remuneration to accommodate fuel price hike - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India gifted 500,000 doses of the COVID-19 vaccine which kicked off Sri Lanka's vaccine rollout in late January. The vaccines were given to the frontline workers and the security personnel.
